attributes.action: Strip Boris Johnson of his title as a PM and ban him from politics
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson has not entered politics for the good of the country or its people but rather for his own selfish gains therefore not only should he be forced to resign as a PM but as an MP as well and be given a lifetime ban so that he can never ever influence British politics ever again.
attributes.background: Boris Johnson has not been democratically elected as the Prime Minister of the UK but since he has he wants to dictate whatever he wants against the will of the people, the politicians, the Parliament and most of all against the will of his own party. Therefore he needs to resign and be banned.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that ask for people to be given or to lose their jobs.
